thread.title: The Latest: Kardashians won't post on apps amid Odom illness
thread.title_full: The Latest: Kardashians won't post on apps amid Odom illness

title: The Latest: Kardashians won't post on apps amid Odom illness
text:
Updated: 12:01 p.m. Friday, Oct. 16, 2015 | Posted: 12:01 p.m. Friday, Oct. 16, 2015 The Latest: Kardashians won't post on apps amid Odom illness Sponsored Links The Associated Press LAS VEGAS â€” 
The latest on the hospitalization of Lamar Odom, who was found unconscious Tuesday in a Nevada brothel (all times local): 
8:50 a.m. 
Khloe Kardashian said her family won't be posting content online while attending to estranged husband Lamar Odom's health crisis after he was found unconscious Tuesday at the Love Ranch brothel in Nevada. 
Kardashian's rep confirmed Friday that the message on the reality TV star's official app was posted by the family. 
It read: "As a family, we've decided to hold off on publishing content across our apps while we continue to support and pray for Lamar." 
The message was addressed to fans as a note from Kardashian. The blog-like app offers first-person postings with photos and advice. 
Announcing a posting black-out is a rarity for the family, who meticulously document their lives on various social media channels and the "Keeping Up with the Kardashians" show. 
Odom is hospitalized in Las Vegas. Copyright The Associated Press Sign up for our WFTV Morning News Headlines Newsletter Sign Up
